doc.name: commandArguments
doc.summary: Returns a return-separated list of the commandline arguments

example.p: if "-v" is among the lines of the cmdArgs then

description.overview: Returns a return-separated list of the commandline arguments
description.comments:
The commandArguments function returns the list of the parameters given at the launch of the application.
The list only exists on desktop standalones applications and server scripts. On mobile platform or in the IDE, the commandArguments returns empty.
